author: lightclient
content: I'm not sure if this is explicitly against the guidelines for the server, but personally I'd prefer to not see ads here. There are already enough messages to keep track of ðŸ™‚

author: protolambda
content: Kicked with a warning, and deleted the ad. Fully agree, this is not a place for advertisements, even if they are ethereum-related. And if you're going to play with the rules, don't make an ad with embeds and a page-long text.

author: protolambda
content: Something generic, no embeds, and short like the above ethglobal hackathon link is acceptable
